abstract: Wearing a camouflage shirt, American flag-motif trousers and (obviously) many, many gold chains, Mr. T appeared on Bloomberg Television’s “Taking Stock” to talk up the precious metal.
snippet: Wearing a camouflage shirt, American flag-motif trousers and (obviously) many, many gold chains, Mr. T appeared on Bloomberg Television’s “Taking Stock” to talk up the precious metal.
lead_paragraph: The price of gold continues to rise, so it is only fitting that — of all people — Mr. T is cashing in.

headline.main: Pity the Fool Who Doesn’t Invest in Gold

abstract: I pity the fool who misses this most excellent Bloomberg Television interview.
snippet: I pity the fool who misses this most excellent Bloomberg Television interview.
lead_paragraph: I pity the fool who misses this most excellent Bloomberg Television interview:

headline.main: World’s Fittest Gold Bug: Mr. T
